Refund Policy

Last Updated: July 5, 2025

At Prolux Lab, we are committed to providing high-quality services and ensuring customer satisfaction. This Refund Policy outlines the conditions under which refunds may be issued for our services.

1. Eligibility for Refund

Refunds are only available under specific circumstances, typically related to the non-delivery of service, significant deviation from the agreed-upon service scope, or technical issues attributable to Prolux Lab that prevent service delivery.

  • Service Not Delivered: If a service or training program you paid for was not delivered as agreed upon within the specified timeframe, you may be eligible for a full refund.
  • Major Service Defect: If the service delivered has a major defect that cannot be rectified by Prolux Lab within a reasonable timeframe and significantly impacts the utility or value of the service to you.
  • Cancellation within Grace Period (if applicable): For certain services or training programs, a short grace period (e.g., 24-48 hours after purchase) might apply for cancellation and a full refund, provided the service has not yet commenced or materials have not been extensively accessed. This will be specified at the time of purchase.

Refund requests must be made within [e.g., 14 days] of the original purchase or the date of service completion (whichever is earlier), unless otherwise stated for a specific service.

2. Non-Refundable Services/Situations

Please note that we generally do not offer refunds in the following situations:

  • Change of Mind: We do not offer refunds if you simply change your mind or decide you no longer need the service after it has commenced or materials have been delivered/accessed.
  • Partial Consumption: For services or training programs that have been partially completed or extensively accessed.
  • Third-Party Costs: Any fees paid to third parties (e.g., software licenses, certification exam fees) are non-refundable by Prolux Lab.
  • Failure to Provide Information: If a service cannot be completed due to your failure to provide necessary information or access in a timely manner.
  • Force Majeure: In events beyond our control (e.g., natural disasters, acts of war).
  • Expired Services: Services or training programs that have expired or passed their scheduled delivery date without a valid refund request.

3. Refund Process

To request a refund, please follow these steps:

  1. Contact Us: Send an email to info.produxlab@gmail.com with the subject line "Refund Request - [Your Order/Service Name]".
  2. Provide Details: In your email, include:
    • Your full name and contact information.
    • The date of purchase.
    • The name of the service/program.
    • Your reason for requesting a refund, including any relevant details or evidence (e.g., screenshots, communication logs).
  3. Review: Our team will review your request within [e.g., 5-7 business days] and may contact you for additional information or clarification.
  4. Decision: We will notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund. If approved, the refund will be processed to your original method of payment.

4. Refund Processing Time

If your refund is approved, it will be processed and a credit will automatically be applied to your original method of payment within [e.g., 7-10 business days], depending on your bank or payment provider.

5. Changes to This Refund Policy

We reserve the right to update or change our Refund Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of our services after any modifications to the Refund Policy will constitute your acknowledgment of the modifications and your consent to abide and be bound by the modified Refund Policy.

6. Contact Us

If you have any questions about our Refund Policy, please contact us:

  • By email: info.produxlab@gmail.com
  • By visiting this page on our website: Contact Us Section
